title: Integrating life cycle assessment and multi criteria decision making analysis towards sustainable cocoa production system in Indonesia: An environmental, economic, and social impact perspective
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Devi Maulida Rahmah, Januardi, Puspita Nurlilasari, Efri Mardawati, Roni Kastaman, Koko Iwan Agus Kurniawan, Neng Tanty Sofyana, Ryozo Noguchi
